data.title: Used Southworth A-500 Lift Tables w/ Ball Transfer Top
data.meta-title: Used Southworth A-500 Lift Tables w/ Ball Transfer Top
data.meta-description: Used Southworth A-500 Lift Tables w/ Ball Transfer Top For Sale at American Surplus, In Stock, 1,100 lb. capacity, Nationwide shipping, 24" x 36" platform, call for more information regarding our Used Southworth A-500 Lift Tables w/ Ball Transfer Tops

long-description.p: Used Southworth A-500 Lift Tables w/ Ball Transfer Top For Sale at American Surplus are in stock. These are very convenient if you have the need for a ball transfer table on top of your lift table. They have a 24" x 36" platform that has a ball transfer table attached to it. The steel balls can be raised and lowered above the table to move your item with ease. They have a 1,100 lb. capacity and a lift height of 44". Call our sales department to get more information on our Used Southworth A-500 Lift Tables w/ Ball Transfer Top.

p.strong: We can’t list our entire inventory online, if you do not see what you are looking for, just ask! Quantity discounts available on used lift tables 40-60% off the price of new. Call 800-876-3736 for additional information & a free quote. American Surplus will provide a quote on new equipment if used is unavailable. Nationwide shipping is available. Price and product availability subject to change without notice. Inventory is subject to prior sale.
